pl.isangeles.senlin.core

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.isangeles.senlin.core.Character

  • public class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for game characters like players, NPCs, etc.
    Author:
    Isangeles

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Character()
      Basic constructor for character creation menu, after use this constructor method levelUp() should be called to make new character playable
      Character(java.lang.String name, int level, int experience, Attributes atributes, java.lang.String portraitName, org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc)
      This constructor provides playable character

          throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException,
                 java.io.IOException
        This constructor provides playable character
        Parameters:
        name - Name of character in game
        level - Character experience level
        atributes - Set of character attributes
        portraitName - Name of image file in portrait catalog
